insights.title: What is that??? I don't know

featured.title: We work hard to build solid and long-lasting relationships with our clients. Here are some of the amazing companies we are lucky to work with.

row1.description: Team had a wonderful experience of collaborating with a singer, music producer and a music band member Sean Patwell. He has always dreamt of having something reminiscent of a portable vocal recording studio. Sean came up with an idea to create an iPhone app that will record your voice over music and share the results. So we got down to work to make his ideas happen!
